Thatâ€™s it; we now have everything we need to make multi-step time series forecasts with
an LSTM model on the daily total power consumed univariate dataset. We can tie all of this
together. The complete example is listed below.
# univariate multi-step lstm for the power usage dataset
from math import sqrt
from numpy import split
from numpy import array
from pandas import read_csv
from sklearn.metrics import mean_squared_error
from matplotlib import pyplot
from keras.models import Sequential
